feed.title: Garmin Grafana Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Garmin Grafana: v0.0.1
entry.content:
What's New?

  • switched to FIT file processing with fitparse module, allowing richer data collection for activities (Power, Temperature etc.) and no Timeout error for long activities.
  • Added week at a glance panel on Grafana
  • Added database backup guide on Readme
  • Added support for training readiness, hill score, VO2 max, and race prediction

New panels

What's Changed

  • Remove redundant /etc/timezone bind mount by @geeksville in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/3
  • Fix small typo in log by @ThomasCodez in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/7
  • fix typo in garmin-fetch.py by @greghinsley in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/12
  • chore: remove transformation for SpO2 from sleep intraday by @wolffshots in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/19
  • Use GF_PLUGINS_PREINSTALL for marcusolsson-hourly-heatmap-panel by @yvkszk in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/28

New Contributors

  • @geeksville made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/3
  • @ThomasCodez made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/7
  • @greghinsley made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/12
  • @wolffshots made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/19
  • @yvkszk made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/28
  • @arturgoms contributed to advanced training data functions implementation in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/17 by providing JSON data structures and function templates.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/compare/v0.0.1-beta...v0.0.1

entry.title: New release for Garmin Grafana: v0.0.2
entry.content:
New Features

  • Support for Influxdb and Victoriametrics were added (Experimental)
  • Documented additional ENV variables on Docker Compose and README
  • Fixed a critical Error on Sleep data fetching Thanks to @arturgoms (#43)
  • Introduced TimeZone variable on Grafana panel to ensure correct daily grouping (closing #34 and #48)
  • Grafana now automatically installs heatmap plugins (thanks to @yvkszk for #28)

What's Changed

  • Fix some typos by @j-bs in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/35
  • fix: support Chinese account close #42 by @yihong0618 in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/44
  • added USER_TIMEZONE ENV variable in docker compose example.yml by @suskozaver in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/41

New Contributors

  • @j-bs made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/35
  • @yihong0618 made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/44
  • @suskozaver made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/41

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/compare/v0.0.1...v0.0.2
